page.title: 16A DAY IN THE LIFE OF VANESSA
page.content: I get up at seven-thirty am., get washed at seven forty am., get dressed then go downstairs. I have my breakfast of cereal and toast then I get in the car and come to school. School starts at nine am. When we get to school we have an assembly then we do English. at playtime I play with Becky and Helen. After play we do maths. We have lunch at twelve noon the we play out again. After play we finish off things we have not yet finished. Usually we do activities in the afternoon. After the third play we have story or play games outside. In the summer we go in the swimming pool. Before we go home at three-thirty we say a prayer. When I get home I get my homework done then I go outside to play. At eight- thirty I go to bed.
